text: Kamavahu Pita ambami, Ara, ŋguhi, vamba ambami. Kamavata Pita tavɨyɨ indɨhuta maŋguyundavarahihi Jisas nuŋ nɨmavamba kitɨhumi, Saimon na pamata indarɨna. Pɨrɨ nɨñɨndu aru miku haŋɨnɨŋ muhɨmɨmuhɨm sɨmbɨrayɨndu tɨmbahɨrɨs mɨŋandu. Kandɨhaŋɨnɨŋ tɨmbahɨrɨs ninɨndu taya mɨŋandu. Nurɨŋandɨ krunzapandu mɨŋandu, mana muŋɨnɨŋɨndu taya mɨŋandu, vami.
